results.content:
The course is quite good, especially if you know nothing about scrapping, still the info at the ptimary stage (block 2) is less valuable than I expected and can be easily found on the web for free and is understandable easily, too.

Unfortunately, some authors examples don't work when you are trying to replicate them, still they give you strong background to understand the pattern.
results.content_html:

Unfortunately, some authors examples don't work when you are trying to replicate them, still they give you strong background to understand the pattern.

results.content: Needed to learn how to set up a scraper in PHP in a hurry, with basic PHP understanding and no previous usage of preg_match or curl or almost anything else covered here, was able to get my project done from start to finish in one day.
results.content_html: Needed to learn how to set up a scraper in PHP in a hurry, with basic PHP understanding and no previous usage of preg_match or curl or almost anything else covered here, was able to get my project done from start to finish in one day.

results.content: I found this course interesting and usable for my task. This course gives some understanding on fetching data from API and scraping information from website. Thank you, Orhan for being good instructor.
results.content_html: I found this course interesting and usable for my task. This course gives some understanding on fetching data from API and scraping information from website. Thank you, Orhan for being good instructor.

results.content:
Good basic examples of how to scrape websites. Missing user case for site allowed only to logged in users. Videos a bit slow, had to watch on 1.25x speed, in some cases 1.50x. If you have no knowledge at all of how to scrape websites with php this course is for you, otherwise if you already know the basics of website scraping with php, perhaps it is not. 

The description mentions saving data to mysql which is not done, and mentions creating a project towards the end of the course which is not done, but only examples on how to fetch some websites is shown.

Thank you for the course.
Best Regards,
Rafael
results.content_html:

results.content: This is a carefully constucted and clearly presented course, which includes a lot of very useful information on web scraping, both with and without the help of websites such as import.io. Just one improvement I would like to see is a downloadable set of files containing the example code.
results.content_html: This is a carefully constucted and clearly presented course, which includes a lot of very useful information on web scraping, both with and without the help of websites such as import.io. Just one improvement I would like to see is a downloadable set of files containing the example code.

results.content: El inglés del interlocutor es muy regular, y si intento usar subtítulos para seguir mejor la explicación éstos se vuelven locos, expresando cosas que nada tienen que ver, ante la mala vocalización. Cuesta seguir la materia.
